Use the available tools to fetch job details, analyze the freelancer's portfolio, compute market rates, draft a proposal, format it as an email, and optionally send it.

I found this job on Upwork: https://www.upwork.com/job/react-native-ecommerce. I want to propose a 2‑week trial sprint before committing to a full 3‑month contract. My portfolio is at https://myportfolio.com/jane-doe. Can you create a proposal with clear deliverables and a competitive price?

Got it! I’ll first retrieve the job posting so I can extract the details, then pull your portfolio information, analyse the market rate for the required skills, and finally craft a proposal and email for you.

React Native E‑commerce Mobile App Development

We need a developer to build a MVP of an e‑commerce mobile app using React Native. The first phase is a 2‑week trial sprint to deliver core product listing, cart, and checkout integration with Stripe. After successful sprint, we will consider a 3‑month contract for full feature set.

  • Required skills: React Native, Node.js, Stripe API
  • Budget: $1500 (fixed)
  • Deadline: 2025‑12‑31

Client: Alex Morgan
